description.value:
Sturdy Gauntlets that allow for delicate manipulation, kept warm through powered mini-radiators within them, power cells set within thin forearm shields, can be recharged or used to charge other devices, if used to power up devices provides +10 to the Tech-Use Test. Can also provide 1d5 lasgun/laspistol shots in an emergency.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 220 T
